title: One Inch At A Time.
description: There are no life changing books. No life changing sessions or seminars. I dont believe people get enlightened on any given day. Life is a slow progression where you can only inch forward. One tiny little step at a time.

title: The Big Self Help Scam.
description: As the Self Help Gurus run advertisement on YouTube looking for vunnerable individuals, the whole self help industry turns into one collosal scam. This post covers how this scam works and how even regular  people like you and me can fall for it.
